courses.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Networks
courses.description: This program focuses on the design, implementation, and management of computer networks and telecommunications systems.

course_units.title: Introduction to Networking
course_units.description: Fundamentals of computer networks and telecommunications.

course_units.title: Network Programming
course_units.description: Programming concepts and techniques for network applications.

course_units.title: Computer Systems Architecture
course_units.description: Hardware and software architecture of computer systems.

course_units.title: Data Communications
course_units.description: Principles and practices of data communications.

course_units.title: Operating Systems for Networks
course_units.description: Operating system concepts relevant to networking.

course_units.title: Network Mathematics
course_units.description: Mathematical foundations for network design and analysis.

course_units.title: Network Protocols and Standards
course_units.description: Study of key networking protocols and industry standards.

course_units.title: Network Security
course_units.description: Security concepts and practices for computer networks.

course_units.title: Wireless Networks
course_units.description: Design and implementation of wireless networking technologies.

course_units.title: Network Administration
course_units.description: Management and administration of network systems.

course_units.title: Routing and Switching
course_units.description: Advanced routing and switching concepts and implementations.

course_units.title: Network Design and Implementation
course_units.description: Comprehensive network planning, design, and deployment.

course_units.title: Network Performance and Optimization
course_units.description: Techniques for analyzing and optimizing network performance.

course_units.title: Network Capstone Project
course_units.description: Comprehensive project demonstrating integrated networking skills.

course_units.title: Software-Defined Networking
course_units.description: Principles and practices of software-defined networking.
